## Transport.waitForConnected() method

Returns a promise which resolves once the UA is connected. DEPRECATION WARNING: just use afterConnected()

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
waitForConnected(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
